original_title: Deep Purple: From The Setting Sun To The Rising Sun Limited Edition
overview: Double bill of live shows by British rockers Deep Purple. The first show, at the open air Wacken festival in Germany, includes the hits 'Vincent Price', 'Strange Kind of Woman' and 'Perfect Strangers'. The second, at the Nippon Budokan in Tokyo, Japan, includes 'Hard Lovin' Man', 'Above and Beyond' and 'Smoke On the Water'.
title: Deep Purple: From The Setting Sun To The Rising Sun Limited Edition
